metadata.name: Fear
metadata.description: The story is about  Anna ,  a lonely girl who is an Android and lives in 2085, after a disruption on her operating system on a rainy night she realized that she is not a human being, contrary to all that she believed and  all the memories and feelings she had experienced were not real and all those images were simulated  on her memory device . that night she had  the most humane feelings that she had ever experienced  fear, anxiety, and anger at those who had held her in a false bubble for years.
